rows: Sunshine conversation app ID from your Ada account.
Sunshine conversation API key from your Ada account.
Sunshine conversation API secret from your Ada account.
Leave the checkbox selected to receive chats via the channel.
The chat queue that processes the messages that come via this channel.
Expected language of channel messages. This lets the agents use quick reply templates in the customer language.
html:
Parameter

Parameter value

Connected Sunshine app

Sunshine conversation app ID from your Ada account.

API key

Sunshine conversation API key from your Ada account.

API secret

Sunshine conversation API secret from your Ada account.

Active

Leave the checkbox selected to receive chats via the channel.

Queue

The chat queue that processes the messages that come via this channel.

Language

Expected language of channel messages. This lets the agents use quick reply templates in the customer language.
